title: Art Deco style
content:

comments.content:
Also from Elsner+Flake  
 [http://www.fonts4ever.com/search\_result.php?view=1&referrerID=001&f\_item...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110653/http:/www.fonts4ever.com/search_result.php?view=1&referrerID=001&f_item_name=Plaza "http://www.fonts4ever.com/search\_result.php?view=1&referrerID=001&f\_item\_name=Plaza")  
Font designed by Alan Meeks in 1995.  
So E+F may be the preferred version. Not certain about this.  
Don
